summary: Kaie, one of the Madanach's most trusted assets is now free to roam the Reach and the rest of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Now you can finally have your crazed Forsworn ally that you've always wanted.

Info:
You can find her in Druadach Redoubt after you help the Forsworn escape Cidhna Mine. 
She prefers 1 handed weaponry but also is skilled with certain spells. 
She levels with the player and her gear is also leveled.

Installation:
Extract to data, simple as can be.

Compatibility:
Compatible with everything, doesn't require anything to run.
If you wish to change her appearance with any other mods or anything else feel free to, it won't change how the mod operates.
author: Zach117
